item.title: Power Bank
item.description: Power Bank # Description # This power bank is used to power the vive wireless module via a usb a cable. The powerbank charges via the short usb c cable.

item.title: Setup
item.description: Setup # Beam vr is a application which combines virtual an real reality. 2. Start the application # start application

item.title: Start Application
item.description: Starting the application # Requisitions # Unity Hub Unity 2020.3.14f1 Steam Steam VR Preferred Way # The game is found in the Documents folder of the pc. Double click it and everything should work. If Steam Vr is not starting up, start it up manually. For starting steam vr look into SteamVR. Build it yourself # If the Application executable is not available you can build and run it yourself.

item.title: SteamVR
item.description: Starting steam vr # You can start steam vr manually if it wont start for some reason. Start up steam and click the VR icon in the top right corner.

item.description: Vive Face and Head Pillow Cleaning kit # Description # This kit is for cleaning the vr glasses.

item.title: Vive Face Pillow
item.description: Vive Face Pillow # Description # Those are the leather face pillow which can be cleaned and disinfected. They are mounted on the front of the headset with velcro fastener. Use those preferable for the face coverings. Quantity # 4 Note: one is on the headset and 3 is in the bag

item.title: Vive Foamed Face Pillow
item.description: Vive Foamed Face Pillow # Description # This is the original face covering. Please don’t use it. It cannot be cleaned.

item.title: Vive Foamed Head Pillow
item.description: Vive Foamed Head Pillow # Description # This is the original face covering. Please don’t use it. It cannot be cleaned.

item.title: Vive Glasses Protection
item.description: Vive Glasses Protection # Description # This should be placed in the glasses for protection from the sun.

item.title: Vive Head Pillow
item.description: Vive Face Pillow # Description # Those are leather head pillows and can be cleaned and disinfected. They are mounted on the back of the headset with velcro fastener. Use those preferably. Quantity # 2 Note: one is on the headset and one is in the bag

item.title: Vive Lighthouse
item.description: DCIN Cable # Description # These are used to track the controller and the vr glasses

item.title: Vive Tracker
item.description: Vive Tracker # Sticker # Every one of these Tracker have specific stickers. One of them can be seen in the image. Those are labeled with R, L, H or nothing. Meanings # Label Meaning H Tracker for the hip (“HÃ¼fte”) R Tracker for the right Foot L Tracker for the left Foot Ports # Charging port # The charging port is usb-c you can use any usb cable to charge them.

item.title: Vive Tracker Belt Strap
item.description: Vive Tracker Belt Strap # Description # These are straps for the foot. It would be advisable to them a little losse before someone comes. Other than that you only need to turn the tracker into the strap. Quantity # 1

item.title: Vive Tracker Dock
item.description: Vive Tracker Dock # Description # The naming in the documentation may be a bit confusing. It is not really a dock for the tracker but instead a dock for the tracker dongle. Ports # Connection port # This port is used to connect the dock to the computer with usb-c-to-usb-a Dock port # The vive tracker dongle connects to via the usb a port on the top.

item.title: Vive Tracker Dongle
item.description: Vive Tracker Dongle # Description # Those tracker dongles can be plugged into the computer but should be connected to the vive tracker dock. Sticker # For the Sticker meanings please look at the sticker meanings of the tracker.

item.title: Vive Tracker Foot Straps
item.description: Vive Tracker Foot Straps # Description # These are straps for the foot. It would be advisable to them a little losse before someone comes. Other than that you only need to turn the tracker into the strap. Quantity # 2

item.title: Vive Video Cable
item.description: Vive Video Cable # Description # This is the cable which connects the pc on way or another with the pc. The short one is for connecting the cable to the wireless module and the long one is for connecting it to the vive box Quantity # 1 Short 1 Long
